ABOUT US
Rather than rely on an outdated guidebook, Go Dubrovnik allows you to get tips from insiders. We’ve cherry-picked our favourite places, bars, restaurants and events – it’s like having a friend show you the best spots. Go Dubrovnik is a joy to use, whether you just want to find out more about Dubrovnik, or you’re actually planning to spend your holidays in Croatia’s number one destination. If you’re looking for entertainment, a dash of history and the best tips from locals, then tune in to Go Dubrovnik
Contact us: info@godubrovnik.com
